abstract: Now that Amazon’s market value is nearly the same as eBay’s, it could buy the online auction site. That could help improve Amazon’s finances and eBay’s customer satisfaction.
snippet: Now that Amazon’s market value is nearly the same as eBay’s, it could buy the online auction site. That could help improve Amazon’s finances and eBay’s customer satisfaction.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: I posted two follow ups to this post. One is on the consumer frustration with eBay. The other is about the disillusionment of its sellers.
